name: polar-npm
description: Basic internal NPM commands which extend NPM functionality

scripts.test: RESULT="$(find . -name '**Test.js' -o -name '**TestN.js' -o -name '**TestNK.js' -not -path 'node_modules/*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'No tests'; else yarn run mocha; fi;
scripts.compile: RESULT="$(find . -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -name '*.d.ts*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'Nothing to Compile'; else yarn run tsc; fi;
scripts.karma: RESULT="$(find . -name '**Test.js' -o -name '**TestK.js' -o -name '**TestNK.js' -not -path 'node_modules/*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'No tests'; else timeout 2m npx karma start; fi;
scripts.watch: RESULT="$(find . -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -name '*.d.ts*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'Nothing to Compile'; else yarn run tscwatch; fi;
scripts.citest: RESULT="$(find . -name '**Test.js' -o -name '**TestN.js' -o -name '**TestNK.js' -not -path 'node_modules/*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'No tests'; else yarn run mocha; fi;
